name: Truco Paulista Playspace
description:
Truco Paulista by Playspace is an online multiplayer game where you can chat with your friends while you challenge them or one of the other thousands of players who make up our community.

Be the best Truco Paulista online player!

FEATURES

- It’s free to play!
- Chat and play with your friends.
- Become the best Truco Paulista player in our ranking.
- Play special games: in pairs, turbo and private
- Compete to be the best player in our Truco Paulista Playspace Ranking.
- Get double coins when you win your games with the "Double or Nothing"
- Unlock achievements and progress through the game getting gifts and coins

Follow us on Facebook http://goo.gl/qXIggC and Twitter https://twitter.com/playspace?lang=es to know more about the games of Playspace and contact us.

If you have any problem we will help you solve it and you can recommend us how we can improve our games https://www.facebook.com/playspace/?ref=ts&fref=ts

Remember, you will need to be connect to play. Terms and Conditions:
http://goo.gl/u30FLZ

Thank you,
The Playspace Team.
